snippet: Officials said Friday that they were reversing a decision that significantly raised the rent for a 93-year-old widow, and would review similar cases.
abstract: New York City officials announce reversal of decision that raised rent of 93-year-old widow Qiao Xiao He after her husband died; He is one of eight plaintiffs in federal suit file against city Finance Dept for similar rent hikes, despite fact that plaintiffs were enrolled in city programs that reduced or froze rents; city plans to review similar cases.
lead_paragraph: Officials said Friday that they were reversing a decision that significantly raised the rent for a 93-year-old widow, and would review similar cases.

headline.main: New York Grants Subsidy to Widow After Lawsuit Over Rent-Freeze Eligibility
headline.print_headline: City Grants Widow, 93, Rent Subsidy After Lawsuit
